lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an article on Monday about the Holiday Festival men’s basketball final between St. John’s and Virginia Tech at Madison Square Garden misidentified the winning team at one point in some editions. As the article noted elsewhere, the winner was Virginia Tech — not West Virginia.
